ext_desc.message: Let the copy experience more better

opt_copy_on_select_in_box.message: Automatically opy selected text in edit box

opt_copy_title_raw_fmt.message: Set the text format when copy title and url of tab(s)

opt_copy_title_fmt.message: Set the HTML format when copy title and url of tab(s)

opt_remove_hidden_elements.message: Automatically clean up hidden element when selected copy

opt_store_cache_on_exit.message: Save clipboard cache when exiting the current window

opt_cache_size.message: The maximum number of cached copy reserved

opt_always_allow_copy.message: Unlock page restriction to allow copy by default

restore_notify.message: Option has been restored to the last saved settings

cmd_copy_curtab_in_html.message: Copy the title&url of current tab in html format

cmd_copy_curtab_in_text.message: Copy the title&url of current tab in text format

cmd_copy_alltabs_in_html.message: Copy the title&url of all tabs in html format

cmd_copy_alltabs_in_text.message: Copy the title&url of all tabs in text format
